title: Tested: Soundboks Go is a Bluetooth speaker big on size, volume, battery-life, and bass
content:
Perhaps the craziest thing about the new suitcase-sized Soundboks Go is not that it makes the original HomePod look like the mini – rather that it’s not the company’s largest battery-powered Bluetooth speaker …

more…

The post Tested: Soundboks Go is a Bluetooth speaker big on size, volume, battery-life, and bass appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Perhaps the craziest thing about the new suitcase-sized Soundboks Go is that it's not the company's largest battery-powered Bluetooth speaker
